mapper.insert:
insert into need_out_sou
companyName,
tradeId,
otherTrade,
post,
enginName,
needCount,
speciality,
`describe`,
createTime,
startDate,
endDate,
contactName,
phone,
openId,
state
values
#{companyName},
#{tradeId},
#{otherTrade},
#{post},
#{enginName},
#{needCount},
#{speciality},
#{describe},
now(),
#{startDate},
#{endDate},
#{contactName},
#{phone},
#{openId},
1
mapper.update:
update need_out_sou set
companyName=#{companyName},
tradeId=#{tradeId},
otherTrade=#{otherTrade},
post=#{post},
enginName=#{enginName},
needCount=#{needCount},
speciality=#{speciality},
`describe`=#{describe},
startDate=#{startDate},
endDate=#{endDate},
contactName=#{contactName},
phone=#{phone},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from need_out_sou where openId=#{openId} order by createTime desc
